<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\då·éƒ¨ç« èŠ‚å›.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´: ${chapter.uT} å­—æ•°: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

function reurl(a){var b='';var c=csplit(a,8).split('\r\n');for(var i=0;i<(c.length-1);i++){b=b+String.fromCharCode((parseInt(c[i],2)-10).toString(10))}return b}

function csplit(a,b,c){b=parseInt(b,10)||76;c=c||'\r\n';if(b<1){return false}return a.match(new RegExp(".{0,"+b+"}","g")).join(c)}

r=result.match(/(reurl[^)]+\))/)[1]
s=eval('('+r+')')
result="magnet:?xt=urn:btih:"+s
</js>

}

var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
Â    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
Â    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
Â    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
Â    bytes.forEach(a => {
Â Â Â    bt = a & 0xff;
Â Â Â    if (bt < 16) {
Â Â Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append("0");
Â Â   Â  }
Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
Â    });
Â    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")

  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,

  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)

if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
//java.log(doc)
doc;
</js>

var data = [];

};
if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).response.body ? (JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits.hits : JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits) : [];
    for (i in list) {
        name = list[i].fields.title;
        var collections = [];
        var collectionElements = list[i].fields.collection;
        for (var j in collectionElements) {
            collections.push(String(collectionElements[j]));
        }
        collection = collections.join(',');
        if (list[i].fields.mediatype.includes('collection')) {
            author = 'ã€é»˜è®¤åˆé›†ã€‘';
            if (collection.includes('texts')) {
                author = 'ã€ä¹¦ç±åˆé›†ã€‘';
            } else if (collection.includes('movies')) {
                author = 'ã€è§†é¢‘åˆé›†ã€‘';
            } else if (collection.includes('audio') || collection.includes('etree')) {
                author = 'ã€éŸ³é¢‘åˆé›†ã€‘';
            } else if (collection.includes('image')) {
                author = 'ã€å›¾åƒåˆé›†ã€‘';
            } else {
                author = 'ã€æˆ‘çš„åˆé›†ã€‘';
            }
            kind = shortenNumber(list[i].fields.item_count || 0) + ' items' + ',' + formatBytes(list[i].fields.collection_size || 0) + ',collection' + ',' + collection;
            latest = '';
        } else {
            author = String(list[i].fields.creator).replace(/\,\s/g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/undefined/g, '');
            kind = String('âœ¦ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.downloads || 0) + ',' + 'â™¥ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.num_favorites || 0) + ',' + String(list[i].fields.mediatype).replace(/etree/, 'music') + ',' + list[i].fields.language + ',' + list[i].fields.year).replace(/undefined/g, '').replace(/âœ¦\s\,/, 'âœ¦ 0,').replace(/â™¥\s\,/, 'â™¥ 0,');
            latest = 'Addeddate: ' + String(list[i].fields.addeddate).replace(/T/, ' ').replace(/Z/, '');
        }
        intro = String(list[i].fields.description).replace(/undefined/g, '');
        cover = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/services/img/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        url = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/details/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put('Type' + url, list[i].fields.mediatype);
        cache.put('Identifier' + url, list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put('Name' + url, name);
        cache.put('Author' + url, author);
        cache.put('Kind' + url, kind);
        cache.put('Cover' + url, cover);
        cache.put('Intro' + url, intro);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': url
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/&page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '&page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var nextlist = JSON.parse(next).response.body ? (JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits.hits : JSON.parse(next).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits) : [];
    if (!list[0] || !nextlist[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

}(key));

);
with(javaImport){

        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");

}

}

for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

} else {

this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1'); var mwsign = cache.get("mw-sign") || ''; java.put("mw-sign", mwsign); if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("mw-sign"))) { var signdate = sign(); cache.put("mw-sign", signdate); } let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ?
